div.head: Welcome to the Big Tree
div.p: The Big Tree is a sample DSpace document repository hosted on DSpaceDirect. This site uses the DSpace "Mirage" theme, but changes the default layout of the page, adds a custom color scheme, and a custom header/footer.
Although this site has a "dspacedirect.org" URL, we can work with you to ensure your site has a URL belonging to your institution.
This area of introductory text can be customized to contain news or information about the site.
